title: Diaries of an Oni Bride in Asakusa - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Supernatural
tags: Childhood Friends   Fantasy Creatures   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Reincarnation
author: Yuuma Midori   友麻碧
description:
Ibaraki Maki is a highschool girl who lives in Asakusa and loves the food there above all else.

Despite being only human, she likes to poke her nose into troubles involving ayakashi on a daily basis. Moreover, her go-to method of resolving said trouble often involves using her brute strength.

This was because she had a secret: she had memories of her previous life.

What’s more, those memories weren’t that of a human; they belonged to the oni princess whose name reached far and wide during the Heian period—the infamous Ibaraki-doji.

Dragging along Amasake Kaoru, her classmate and reincarnation of her husband in their previous life, Shuten-doji, the strongest oni bride bustles about the streets of Asakusa again today to help the troubled ayakashi!>
